fl_G_max_from_hpbw¶

pycraf.antenna.fl_G_max_from_hpbw(hpbw)[source] [edit on github]¶

Estimate maximum gain from antenna hpbw after ITU-R Rec F.699.

Parameters
hpbwQuantity

Antenna HPBW (3-dB point) [deg]

Returns
G_maxQuantity

Antenna maximum gain [dBi]

Notes

See ITU-R Rec F.699 for further explanation and applicability of this model.
